Comment:
Hi everyone!

Master Freddy is contemplating another mini-tournament based on the Halloween Gambit.  I decided to test this particular water with him, taking the black side.  I did not use the database but my choices proved to be a disaster, anyhow, on with the show which begins with 1. e4.
3. ...... Nf6 - a perfectly quiet, normal Four Knights Opening, but next move that is gonna change!

4. Nxe5 - here it is, the Halloween Gambit, Freddy gambits a horsie for a pawn and speedy development.  Naturally I accept the gambit by taking on e5.
4. ....... Ng6 - I do not wish my horsie to go back to c6 only to be forced back to b8 but would that have been a better alternative?
